cnbc.summary: General Motors' stock is having its best year since the company's reemergence from bankruptcy in 2009.

cnbc.title: Silver futures log worst day since 2021, retreating sharply from record
cnbc.summary: Silver slid more than 8% on Monday, after topping $80 for the first time ever in overnight trading.

cnbc.title: Trump threatens to 'knock the hell' out of Iran if they build weapons
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump threatened further military action against Iran during a Monday meeting at Mar-a-Lago with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

cnbc.title: California's Ro Khanna faces Silicon Valley backlash after embracing wealth tax
cnbc.summary: A proposal to tax California billionaires at 5% of their wealth could land on the California ballot in November.

cnbc.summary: Japan's SoftBank on Monday said it has agreed to buy data center investment firm DigitalBridge for $4 billion.

cnbc.title: Zelenskyy asks Trump for 50 years of security guarantees, says meeting with Russia possible
cnbc.summary: Ukraine's president, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, said Monday that he had asked for security guarantees for up to 50 years for Ukraine.

cnbc.title: A Swedish city is being moved — building by building — amid Europe’s minerals push
cnbc.summary: Sweden's northernmost city of Kiruna is on the move because of ground subsidence from the expansion of the world's largest underground iron ore mine.

cnbc.title: Bankruptcy success rate for student loan borrowers jumps to 87%, study finds
cnbc.summary: The success rate for student loan borrowers in bankruptcy has "jumped" to 87%, a study finds. But many people still don't pursue the option.

cnbc.summary: To lower kids' screen time, experts recommend keeping screens out of bedrooms and having a special place for devices in the house.
